"Mug-mentor" - A coffee mug with a built-in mentorship program, where the mug provides daily affirmations and motivational quotes to help you start your day on a positive note.
"Mug-a-palooza" - A coffee mug with a built-in musical instrument, allowing the user to play simple melodies and beats while sipping their coffee.
"Mug-vision" - A coffee mug with a built-in augmented reality display, showing the user's favorite memories or artwork while they drink.
"Mug-game" - A coffee mug with a built-in game, such as a puzzle or a simple strategy game, to keep the user entertained while they drink.
